name: Christine Franklyn
what_you_do: As the founder of the Good Living Network, Christine Franklyn helps fellow coaches, therapists, and other passion driven entrepreneurs grow their businesses without frustration, applying proven marketing strategies in a way that's aligned with them.
who_you_serve: Coaches, therapists, and other passion driven entrepreneurs
social_proof: Christine is a co-author of two best selling books and the host of her own podcast, the Reclaim Your A Game podcast.
business_focus: Helping passion-driven entrepreneurs grow their businesses without frustration by applying proven marketing strategies in an aligned way.
